badiyudin (385)  nagenahira, nagenahira lesama thibiya yuthuya! (385)  indiya widesha lekam shri lankawata (384)  deshapalagnyayin demala janathawa godurak karagena ! (384)  demala, muslim nayakayinge eekabaddhathawaya ratata wisadumak ! (384)  pokattuwakata widda inspektar si.si.ti.wi nisa mattu ! (383)  rathnapura pathalakin kes palinguwak hamuwe (382)  sushma swaraj nuduredima shri lankawata ! (381)  randawiyan nidahas karanna - komisamata paminillak (381)  chaura senankaye bhashwara senanka dan koheda? (381)  apa sandaha wana wisandama apa wisinma illiya yuthuya! (380)  illim 05k mulika karagena udghoshana pawathwannemu - em.ke.shiwajilingam (379)  shiwajilingam kalu kodi wirodhathawayakata saraseyi (378)  fedaral kramaya shakthimath kala yuthuya ! (378)  wyawasthawa sambandhayen sakachchawak! (378)  dakunu palath maha amathi athadanguwata gannayi, warenthu (378)  eekabaddha wipakshaya wirodhatha athhari (377)  lankawe prajathanthrawadi peraliya prashansaniyayi (377)  etka wirodhathawalata marayo ewanawa (377)  ada dinaya shri lanka ithihasaye wadagath dinayaki - sumandiran (376)  jarmaniye el.ti.ti.ee samajikayekuta athhitawu siradanduwam ! (376)  maha amathige niwedanayata athsan na !

ee anuwa nawin adhikaram mahatha sabhapathi lesath, fawusar sherifdin mahatha pradhana widhayaka niladhari lesath path karamin pudgalika anshaye ha rajya anshaye dakshatha athi pirisak adhyaksha mandalaya sandaha path karanu labanawa.

mewara awasan wataya sadaha nataya 13k theri athi bawa natyakarayata danagannata labuni peba. 10 - ranjith dharmakirthi ge angara ganga gala basi peba. 11 - rajitha disanayaka ge aadara wasthuwa peba. 12 - dab.es.wijesinha ge tren drayiwar peba.13 - ee.em.di. upali ge idame di wikine peba. 14 - aar.em.yasarathna ge uththarithara peba. 15 - senaka edirisinha ge blakawut peba. 16 - chamika hathlahawaththa ge makarata peba. 17 - buddhika damayantha ge we guwera (maraා damu jiwathwana minisaා) peba. 18 - priyankara rathnayaka ge wisekariyo peba. 19 - akhila sapumal ge rawana aadaraye husma langa peba. 20 - udayasiri wikramarathna ge ragapam iwarayi peba. 21 - jayalath manorathna ge sellam nirindu peba. 22 - parakrama nirialla ge hunuwataye kathawa peba. 26 - upananda walikala ge muham (aaradhitha damila natya) peba. 28- daglas siriwardhana ge bera handa (aaradhitha sinhala natya) keti natya ulela sandaha keti natya 15 k da awasan watayata theri atha.

niyojya karthruwarun wana chandana dayasiriwardhana, thissa dhammika, chathura githanath bandara menma upa kathuwarun wana asanka dewamithra perera, chandu liyanaaarachchi, chayarupa shilpi malan karunarathna, pitu sakasum shilpi chaksu wansith abewikrama, sarasawiye hama karyayakatama ura dena sugath priyantha, pariganaka akshara salasum shilpi apa siyallangema wadimahalla wana gamini perera samanga wisheshanga lekhakayan wana sanjiwa sampath balasuriya, prasad samarathunga, thilani shanika withanachchi, yatheja gnyanarathna saha pariganaka sahayika nadisha rajawardhana athulu me siyalu denage samuhika kapawima nowannata brahaspathindata nisi paridi sarasawiya oba athata path wanne natha.nam washayen wenas wuwa da panas ek wasarak mululle wiwidha wu boho denek sarasawiya kathu madullata dayaka wi sitiyaha.
